features: Emits up to 375 lumens on maximum setting
Dual beam configuration, offering the two lighting modes most used by climbers: Climbing Mode and Route-Finding Mode
Climbing mode allows you to illuminate the holds or the path in front of you thanks to its wide and homogeneous beam of 300 lumens
Route-Finder mode activates a powerful and focused long-range beam and achieves an output of 375 lumens
Double PowerTap™ technology allows easy switching between Climbing and Route-Finder modes with a simple tap of a finger on the right or left of the front of the case
Two power supply options: Maximum versatility with power either by BD 1800 lithium-ion rechargeable battery or by alkaline batteries(included)
Elastic band with pimples for better breathability, performance and lightness
Intensity memory allowing the lamp to be turned on and off at the chosen intensity without going back to intermediate or maximum lighting
Locking function to prevent inadvertent ignition in the bag or pocket
IP67: Watertightness and dust resistance: the housing is completely sealed and has been tested to operate at a depth of 1m max. underwater for 30 minutes. Requires no maintenance after immersion
